name: orlando
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a large city in the southern US state of Florida, which is a popular place for holidays: They bought a lakeside home in Orlando. He and his wife relocated from Orlando.
More examplesFewer examplesThe film opens in Orlando on Friday.Orlando's marine life is thriving.
